REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1235 reute b f BC-INTERFINCO-SETS-50-ML 04-13 0075

TEXT.TITLE: INTERFINCO SETS 50 MLN SFR FIVE-YEAR CONVERTIBLE
TEXT.BODY: Interfinco S.A. Of Luxembourg is launching a 50 mln Swiss franc five-year convertible bond with an indicated coupon of 2-1/2 pct, lead manager S.G. Warburg Soditic SA said. The issue, guaranteed by Cofide-Compagnia Finanziaria de Benedetti SpA of Turin, Italy, is convertible into shares of <CIR SpA - Compagnie Industriali Riunite> at an indicated premium of five pct. REUTER
